Package com.rexsl.test.request

Requests.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApacheRequest
    Implementation of Request, based on Apache HTTP client.
    FakeRequest
    Implementation of Request that always returns the same response, specified in the constructor.
    JdkRequest
    Implementation of Request, based on JDK.

Package com.rexsl.test.request Description

Requests.

This package contains implementations of class Request. The most popular and easy to use it JdkRequest.

However, in some situations JdkRequest falls short and ApacheRequest should be used instead. For example, JdkRequest doesn't support PATCH HTTP method due to a bug in HttpURLConnection.

Since:
0.10
Version:
$Id$
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
